fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Refine a player, changing their role into another role that the host views as a somewhat direct downgrade to their current role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a role can't be downgraded, they instead gain an decrease to their attack and defense tier. If at None, they get reduced to Vulnerable, then Fragile. Anything below that kills them. This always succeeds, because a None attack is better than Fragile defense. You are not notified of this
- If you self target, you become Rough (3792).
